title: Physicians Committee for Responsible Medicine
description: The Physicians Committee for Responsible Medicine is a nonprofit health organization that promotes preventive medicine, conducts clinical research, and encourages higher standards for ethics and effectiveness in research and medical training.
cleaned_text: Making the World a Better Place for People and Animals Please support our mission to advocate for ethical research, end animal cruelty, and promote plant-based nutrition.
